forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West wind around 17 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the sun graces the skyline, casting a golden hue over the bustling cityscape. With temperatures hovering in the comfortable range, the atmosphere feels breezy yet warm, inviting one to step outside. The gentle westward wind whispers through the streets, offering a refreshing contrast to the sun-soaked warmth that envelopes the day. Although the forecast suggests a gradual fall in temperature as the afternoon wanes, the clarity of the skies remains steady, with nary a hint of fogging to obscure the view across the bay. 

As evening approaches, temperatures will dip slightly, yet the promise of a clear night, tinged with the gentle blush of dusk, remains. Those venturing out might favor light layers, perhaps a cardigan or a light jacket, to ward off the coolness while strolling through the vibrant streets or enjoying a tranquil bench-side moment at a local park. This splendid afternoon is perfect for a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero or a casual gathering with friends at an outdoor café, where the glorious weather can be savored against the backdrop of the iconic city skyline.
